channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Daily occurrence of site not being protected, 18th February
item.description:
Site left unsafe, this is almost daily. Reporting again

item.title: Rubbish there for four days, 18th February

item.title: Builders Fences not needed in Cockmannings Road, 18th February
item.description:

item.title: Pot hole, 18th February
item.description:
Pot on speed bump . I can see you have marked another speed bump but not this one that has a big pot hole on edge of it. It's the 3rd speed bump from end of road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crofton Lane, Crofton, Greater London

item.title: Burst water main not been repaired properly, 18th February
item.description:

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 18th February

item.title: The estate cleaner has not picked up letter for over a year, 17th February
item.description:
The cleaners have not picked up litter along this stretch of green for a year. It’s full of rubbish including drug paraphernalia food products disgusting chicken parts and food and I’ve seen rat frequently. Hackney please clean this area on a regular basis

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gray's Inn Road, King's Cross, Greater London

item.title: Loud Thames Water manhole cover, 17th February
item.description:
